statement.title: Problem Description
statement.content: Alice has a sequence A, She wants to split A into as much as possible continuous subsequences, satisfying that for each subsequence, every its prefix sum is not small than 0.

statement.title: Input
statement.content:
The input consists of multiple test cases.
Each test case begin with an integer n in a single line.
The next line contains $n$ integers $A_{1},A_{2}\cdots A_{n}$.
$1 \leq n \leq 1e6$
$-10000 \leq A[i] \leq 10000$
You can assume that there is at least one solution.

statement.title: Output
statement.content: For each test case, output an integer indicates the maximum number of sequence division.
